lemma atc_io_reduction_on_sets_from_obs :
  assumes "L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M1 T \<subseteq> L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M2 T" 
  and "(\<Union>io\<in>L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M1 T. {io} \<times> B M1 io \<Omega>) \<subseteq> (\<Union>io\<in>L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M2 T. {io} \<times> B M2 io \<Omega>)"
shows "atc_io_reduction_on_sets M1 T \<Omega> M2"

lemma atc_io_reduction_on_sets_to_obs :   
  assumes "atc_io_reduction_on_sets M1 T \<Omega> M2"
shows "L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M1 T \<subseteq> L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M2 T" 
  and "(\<Union>io\<in>L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M1 T. {io} \<times> B M1 io \<Omega>) \<subseteq> (\<Union>io\<in>L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M2 T. {io} \<times> B M2 io \<Omega>)"

lemma atc_io_reduction_on_sets_alt_def :
  shows "atc_io_reduction_on_sets M1 T \<Omega> M2 = 
           (L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M1 T \<subseteq> L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M2 T 
            \<and> (\<Union>io\<in>L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M1 T. {io} \<times> B M1 io \<Omega>) 
                \<subseteq> (\<Union>io\<in>L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M2 T. {io} \<times> B M2 io \<Omega>))"

lemma atc_io_reduction_on_sets_to_obs :   
  assumes "atc_io_reduction_on_sets M1 T \<Omega> M2"
shows "L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M1 T \<subseteq> L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M2 T" 
  and "(\<Union>io\<in>L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M1 T. {io} \<times> B M1 io \<Omega>) \<subseteq> (\<Union>io\<in>L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M2 T. {io} \<times> B M2 io \<Omega>)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. M1 \<preceq>\<lbrakk>T\<rbrakk> M2 &&&
    (\<Union>io\<in>L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M1 T. {io} \<times> B M1 io \<Omega>)
    \<subseteq> (\<Union>io\<in>L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M2 T.
                    {io} \<times> B M2 io \<Omega>)

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x.
       x \<in> L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M1 T \<Longrightarrow>
       x \<in> L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M2 T
 2. (\<Union>io\<in>L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M1 T. {io} \<times> B M1 io \<Omega>)
    \<subseteq> (\<Union>io\<in>L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M2 T.
                    {io} \<times> B M2 io \<Omega>)
fix x

 1. \<And>x.

    \<subseteq> (\<Union>io\<in>L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M2 T.

proof (prove)

obtain aas :: "'a list set \<Rightarrow> ('a list \<Rightarrow> ('a \<times> 'b) list set) \<Rightarrow> ('a \<times> 'b) list \<Rightarrow> 'a list" 
      where
      "\<forall>x0 x1 x2. (\<exists>v3. v3 \<in> x0 \<and> x2 \<in> x1 v3) = (aas x0 x1 x2 \<in> x0 \<and> x2 \<in> x1 (aas x0 x1 x2))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>aas.
        \<forall>x0 x1 x2.
           (\<exists>v3. v3 \<in> x0 \<and> x2 \<in> x1 v3) =
           (aas x0 x1 x2 \<in> x0 \<and>
            x2 \<in> x1 (aas x0 x1 x2)) \<Longrightarrow>
        thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by moura

proof (state)
this:
  \<forall>x0 x1 x2.
     (\<exists>v3. v3 \<in> x0 \<and> x2 \<in> x1 v3) =
     (aas x0 x1 x2 \<in> x0 \<and> x2 \<in> x1 (aas x0 x1 x2))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>iseq\<in>T.

    x \<in> L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M2 T
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<forall>x0 x1 x2.
     (\<exists>v3. v3 \<in> x0 \<and> x2 \<in> x1 v3) =
     (aas x0 x1 x2 \<in> x0 \<and> x2 \<in> x1 (aas x0 x1 x2))

have "\<forall>ps f A. (ps \<notin> UNION A f \<or> aas A f ps \<in> A \<and> ps \<in> f (aas A f ps)) 
                          \<and> (ps \<in> UNION A f \<or> (\<forall>as. as \<notin> A \<or> ps \<notin> f as))"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>x0 x1 x2.
     (\<exists>v3. v3 \<in> x0 \<and> x2 \<in> x1 v3) =
     (aas x0 x1 x2 \<in> x0 \<and> x2 \<in> x1 (aas x0 x1 x2))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>ps f A.
       (ps \<notin> \<Union> (f ` A) \<or>
        aas A f ps \<in> A \<and> ps \<in> f (aas A f ps)) \<and>
       (ps \<in> \<Union> (f ` A) \<or>
        (\<forall>as. as \<notin> A \<or> ps \<notin> f as))
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  \<forall>ps f A.
     (ps \<notin> \<Union> (f ` A) \<or>
      aas A f ps \<in> A \<and> ps \<in> f (aas A f ps)) \<and>

    x \<in> L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M2 T

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<forall>ps f A.
     (ps \<notin> \<Union> (f ` A) \<or>
      aas A f ps \<in> A \<and> ps \<in> f (aas A f ps)) \<and>

show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>ps f A.
     (ps \<notin> \<Union> (f ` A) \<or>
      aas A f ps \<in> A \<and> ps \<in> f (aas A f ps)) \<and>

lemma atc_io_reduction_on_sets_alt_def :
  shows "atc_io_reduction_on_sets M1 T \<Omega> M2 = 
           (L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M1 T \<subseteq> L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M2 T 
            \<and> (\<Union>io\<in>L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M1 T. {io} \<times> B M1 io \<Omega>) 
                \<subseteq> (\<Union>io\<in>L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M2 T. {io} \<times> B M2 io \<Omega>))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. M1 \<preceq>\<lbrakk>T.\<Omega>\<rbrakk> M2 =
    (M1 \<preceq>\<lbrakk>T\<rbrakk> M2 \<and>
     (\<Union>io\<in>L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M1 T. {io} \<times> B M1 io \<Omega>)
     \<subseteq> (\<Union>io\<in>L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M2 T.
                     {io} \<times> B M2 io \<Omega>))

using atc_io_reduction_on_sets_to_obs[of M1 T \<Omega> M2] 
  and   atc_io_reduction_on_sets_from_obs[of M1 T M2 \<Omega>]

proof (prove)
using this:
  M1 \<preceq>\<lbrakk>T.\<Omega>\<rbrakk> M2 \<Longrightarrow>
  M1 \<preceq>\<lbrakk>T\<rbrakk> M2
  M1 \<preceq>\<lbrakk>T.\<Omega>\<rbrakk> M2 \<Longrightarrow>
  (\<Union>io\<in>L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M1 T. {io} \<times> B M1 io \<Omega>)
  \<subseteq> (\<Union>io\<in>L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M2 T.
                  {io} \<times> B M2 io \<Omega>)
  \<lbrakk>M1 \<preceq>\<lbrakk>T\<rbrakk> M2;
   (\<Union>io\<in>L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M1 T. {io} \<times> B M1 io \<Omega>)
   \<subseteq> (\<Union>io\<in>L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M2 T.
                   {io} \<times> B M2 io \<Omega>)\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> M1 \<preceq>\<lbrakk>T.\<Omega>\<rbrakk> M2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. M1 \<preceq>\<lbrakk>T.\<Omega>\<rbrakk> M2 =
    (M1 \<preceq>\<lbrakk>T\<rbrakk> M2 \<and>
     (\<Union>io\<in>L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M1 T. {io} \<times> B M1 io \<Omega>)
     \<subseteq> (\<Union>io\<in>L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M2 T.
                     {io} \<times> B M2 io \<Omega>))
by blast

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. {OFSM M1 \<and>
     OFSM M2 \<and>
     asc_fault_domain M2 M1 m \<and> test_tools M2 M1 FAIL PM V \<Omega>} 
     tsN := {};
     cN := V;
     rmN := {};
     obs := L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M2 cN;
     obsI := L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M1 cN;
     obs\<^sub>\<Omega> :=
       (\<Union>io\<in>L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M2 cN.
           {io} \<times> B M2 io \<Omega>);
     obsI\<^sub>\<Omega> :=
       (\<Union>io\<in>L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M1 cN.
           {io} \<times> B M1 io \<Omega>);
     iter := 1;
     WHILE cN \<noteq> {} \<and>
           obsI \<subseteq> obs \<and>
           obsI\<^sub>\<Omega> \<subseteq> obs\<^sub>\<Omega>
      INV {0 < iter \<and>
           tsN = TS M2 M1 \<Omega> V m (iter - 1) \<and>
           cN = C M2 M1 \<Omega> V m iter \<and>
           rmN = RM M2 M1 \<Omega> V m (iter - 1) \<and>
           obs = L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M2 (tsN \<union> cN) \<and>
           obsI = L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M1 (tsN \<union> cN) \<and>
           obs\<^sub>\<Omega> =
           (\<Union>io\<in>L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M2 (tsN \<union> cN).
               {io} \<times> B M2 io \<Omega>) \<and>
           obsI\<^sub>\<Omega> =
           (\<Union>io\<in>L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M1 (tsN \<union> cN).
               {io} \<times> B M1 io \<Omega>) \<and>
           OFSM M1 \<and>
           OFSM M2 \<and>
           asc_fault_domain M2 M1 m \<and>
           test_tools M2 M1 FAIL PM V \<Omega>} 
      VAR {\<lambda>(tsN, cN, rmN, obs, obsI, obs\<^sub>\<Omega>,
              obsI\<^sub>\<Omega>, iter, isReduction). 0} 
      DO iter := iter + 1;
         rmN :=
           {xs' \<in> cN.
            \<not> M1 \<preceq>\<lbrakk>{xs'}\<rbrakk> M2 \<or>
            (\<forall>io\<in>L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M1 {xs'}.
                \<exists>V''\<in>N io M1 V.
                   \<exists>S1 vs xs.
                      io = vs @ xs \<and>
                      mcp (vs @ xs) V'' vs \<and>
                      S1 \<subseteq> nodes M2 \<and>
                      (\<forall>s1\<in>S1.
                          \<forall>s2\<in>S1.
                             s1 \<noteq> s2 \<longrightarrow>
                             (\<forall>io1\<in>RP M2 s1 vs xs V''.
                                 \<forall>io2\<in>RP M2 s2 vs xs V''.
                                    B M1 io1 \<Omega> \<noteq>
                                    B M1 io2 \<Omega>)) \<and>
                      m < LB M2 M1 vs xs (tsN \<union> V) S1 \<Omega> V'')};
         tsN := tsN \<union> cN;
         cN := append_set (cN - rmN) (inputs M2) - tsN;
         obs := obs \<union> L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M2 cN;
         obsI := obsI \<union> L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M1 cN;
         obs\<^sub>\<Omega> :=
           obs\<^sub>\<Omega> \<union>
           (\<Union>io\<in>L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M2 cN.
               {io} \<times> B M2 io \<Omega>);
         obsI\<^sub>\<Omega> :=
           obsI\<^sub>\<Omega> \<union>
           (\<Union>io\<in>L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M1 cN.
               {io} \<times> B M1 io \<Omega>) 
      OD;
     isReduction :=
       (obsI \<subseteq> obs \<and>
        obsI\<^sub>\<Omega> \<subseteq> obs\<^sub>\<Omega>) 
     {isReduction = M1 \<preceq> M2}
proof (vcg)

proof (state)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>tsN cN rmN obs obsI obs\<^sub>\<Omega> obsI\<^sub>\<Omega> iter
       isReduction.
       OFSM M1 \<and>

       asc_fault_domain M2 M1 m \<and>

       0 < iter + 1 \<and>
       tsN \<union> cN = TS M2 M1 \<Omega> V m (iter + 1 - 1) \<and>
       append_set
        (cN -
         {xs' \<in> cN.
          \<not> M1 \<preceq>\<lbrakk>{xs'}\<rbrakk> M2 \<or>
          (\<forall>io\<in>L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M1 {xs'}.
              \<exists>V''\<in>N io M1 V.
                 \<exists>S1 vs xs.
                    io = vs @ xs \<and>
                    mcp (vs @ xs) V'' vs \<and>
                    S1 \<subseteq> nodes M2 \<and>
                    (\<forall>s1\<in>S1.
                        \<forall>s2\<in>S1.

                           (\<forall>io1\<in>RP M2 s1 vs xs V''.
                               \<forall>io2\<in>RP M2 s2 vs xs V''.
                                  B M1 io1 \<Omega> \<noteq>
                                  B M1 io2 \<Omega>)) \<and>
                    m < LB M2 M1 vs xs (tsN \<union> V) S1 \<Omega> V'')})
        (inputs M2) -
       (tsN \<union> cN) =
       C M2 M1 \<Omega> V m (iter + 1) \<and>
       {xs' \<in> cN.
        \<not> M1 \<preceq>\<lbrakk>{xs'}\<rbrakk> M2 \<or>
        (\<forall>io\<in>L\<^sub>i\<^sub>n M1 {xs'}.

        (append_set
